name: Furnax
description: Pip's companion - Black with dark blue stripes, cold aura. Unruly but well-trained, intelligent, rescued by the academy.
personality: Intelligent, unruly but well-trained. Loyal to Pip.
backstory: Rescued by Culdor Academy. Became Pip's companion.
appearance: Black fur with dark blue stripes. Emits a cold aura.

notable_actions.description: Directs the group on how to proceed with a task, showing leadership.
Performs a perception check to ensure the group remains undetected.
Attempts an intimidation roleplay, but the target does not react as expected.
Checks if the party members ate popcorn, implying they might be guilty.
Participated in a boss fight where he and another party member were betrayed.
Was a bodyguard for a wizard during the one-shot, which ended tragically.
Failed to hit the character with a bite attack twice.
Failed to hit the character with a stinger attack, rolling a 13.
Attempts to cast Witchbolt, showing his combat skills and willingness to engage in battle.
Discussed a creative approach to entering the area.
Successfully cast a spell to weaken an enemy.
Mends the ship with Furnax and Mend spell.
Initiates the plan to enter and confront the captain or a prisoner.
Decides to open the arrow as a defensive measure.
Willing to do extra tasks, suggesting a proactive and reliable nature.
Reminding the group of their next task and ensuring nothing is missed.
Demonstrates an ability involving red spots and balls appearing on his arms.
Demonstrates willingness to use meta-knowledge in game situations, suggesting a blend of role-playing and real-world knowledge.
Executed a multi-attack sequence on Jacques.
Participates in the concentration save, showing involvement.
Noticed the injured creature's healing process and deduced its nature.
Provides guidance and support to Pipira during combat
Used Chromatic Fire to deal 12 fire damage in a combat situation.
Cast Chromatic Fire on an enemy to deal 12 fire damage.
Predicts the incoming attack and advises on defense strategies
Uses the Chaotic Shuffle effectively to deal damage in combat.
Describes the bag of distraction and its magical properties.
Decides to move a significant distance in the game, showing initiative.
Threatens to shoot the group if they don't cooperate.
Explain Shield usage and roll outcome
Rolls a successful damage roll, inflicting significant damage on an enemy with a creative description.
Offers to help with the situation but is cautious.
Lied the door and chased a creature off the ship.
Uses Misty Stepper to approach Pipira Shimmerlock from underneath.
Providing information on the depth of a cavern.
Attempted to control a hellhound but failed.
Implies a recent absence and return.
Delivered a critical hit that brought the enemy to bloodied state.
Acknowledges the incapacitation of enemies and their actions, showing tactical awareness.
Acknowledges that he might need to roleplay intimidation.
Threatening to splash water in someone's face if they don't listen, showing a confrontational side.
Describes the character's current state and the immediate visual impacts of the situation.
Evaluating the risk of jumping through a gap in layers.
Uses Furnax to mend the plank and material on the boat

inventory.name: Mentioned as being left behind during the vigilance duty, possibly indicating his importance or reliance.
inventory.description: Furnax is left behind by Sha'ek Mindfa'ek during the vigilance duty, suggesting a possible connection or reason for his presence.

inventory.name: Gains a new item (bag of distraction) and plans to use it strategically.
inventory.description: Furnax plans to use the bag of distraction, noting its unique properties.

inventory.name: Possibly a skill or spell that can be used again, but not immediately.
inventory.description: Furnax mentioned he could use his ability to weaken the hellhound multiple times per day, but it was currently unavailable due to a lack of mana or spell site.

inventory.name: Furnax mentions that he has lost a book named 'Fuckelbergin', indicating the loss of an item.
inventory.description: Furnax recalls losing a book called 'Fuckelbergin' and had to come up with another ship name for his quest.

inventory.name: Discusses the Bag of Distraction and its charges, indicating potential item management issues.
inventory.description: Furnax inquires about the recharging of a Bag of Distraction, suggesting he might be unsure of its proper use.

inventory.name: Possibly gains a mastery property on his weapon, though this is uncertain without more context.
inventory.description: Furnax discusses potential access to a weapon mastery property, which could imply new equipment or abilities.

inventory.name: Possibly mentions buying a shield from the academy.
inventory.description: Furnax references purchasing a shield at the academy, potentially indicating recent equipment changes.

inventory.name: Mentioning his equipment kit.
inventory.description: Furnax mentions having a climbers kit and other equipment, indicating preparation for an upcoming task.

relationships.name: Pipira Shimmerlock
relationships.description: Pip is Furnax's companion and master

relationships.name: Culdor Academy
Supports Pipira and acknowledges her struggle in managing spells.
Demonstrates leadership and teamwork by taking the initiative to enter the captain's area.
Asks Arlinde for a list of people to interview, indicating trust and cooperation.
Considers teaching another character, showing a potential mentorship role or willingness to form an alliance.
Checks Pipira's loyalty and expresses relief upon her confirmation, strengthening their bond in the group.
Counsels Sha'ek, showing a supportive and protective relationship
Expressed jealousy towards Pipira's move, indicating a competitive dynamic.
Shows a willingness to trust his companions despite his initial mistrust.
Interaction with Pipira Shimmerlock, suggesting a dynamic relationship.
Acknowledges the potential danger and impact on Pipira.
Working together with Pipira Shimmerlock to ensure safety.
Describes Oli's reaction to the violence, showing a change in their relationship.
Furnax is forming a potential exit strategy from Pipira's warcheck.
Attempts to join in the action but is interrupted.
Acknowledged and described by another player as a 'glass cannon', indicating recognition of his combat style.
Acknowledges another character's view of the situation, showing awareness and empathy.
Seeking input from the team on how to proceed.
Acknowledging Adelette's vigilance in the team.
Expresses a desire for companionship and acknowledgment from the captain, showing he values social interaction.
Suggests that the group members are on the same side, despite losses.

development_notes.note: Suggests a rotation schedule for the watch duty, indicating leadership potential.
Acknowledges the presence of sleeper agents and expresses doubt.
Considers the possibility that a changeling is involved.
Agrees with Sha'ek's plan and suggests discussing the matter with Alinda.
Expresses concern for a fellow party member's safety and well-being.
Demonstrates a pragmatic approach to ensuring the safety and well-being of their group members.
Exhibits patience and understanding during the dice rolling session.
Asks for a second chance, demonstrating resilience.
Illustrates the consequences of poor decisions and dice rolls, showing a realistic approach to failure.
Acknowledges he should have taken the watch at eight o'clock, showing responsibility.
Admits to not being a cleric and expresses willingness to help.
Furnax is seen as a strategic thinker, trying to influence the group's behavior through psychological tactics.
Furnax demonstrates a strong sense of control and manipulation within the group, using their role to influence others.
Shows readiness to take on new challenges and roles.
Adapts to potential threats by preparing different types of rolls.
Demonstrates a caring and observant nature by noticing signs of discomfort in the creature.
Acknowledges the creature's discomfort and suggests ways to improve its position.
Recognizes the need to improve intimidation skills and acknowledges past experience with it.
Acknowledges the need for rest despite feeling well-rested.
Shows willingness to help others learn
Advises using a different teaching method
Expresses a need to learn from others despite time constraints.
Expresses his preference for spells related to flying and their practical use on a ship.
Shows a more pragmatic approach to character development, focusing on practical skills over flashy abilities.
Experienced betrayal and conflict within the group.
Acknowledges the risk of being a bodyguard and potentially dying.
Goes rogue and turns against his allies, highlighting his potential for betrayal.
Defends his decision to be a bodyguard, explaining the nature of the character's protection.
Reflects on the potential for betrayal and the risks involved as a bodyguard.
Acknowledges the diary’s lack of substantive information and suggests it might be a ruse.
Acknowledged the luck factor in avoiding a critical hit, expressing relief.
Explained Shield mechanics and multi-attacks to the party, showing expertise.
Expresses concern about the use of psychic damage and its consequences.
Admits to overusing a specific ability, showing self-awareness and reflection.
Shows a pragmatic and persistent attitude, willing to continue despite the frustration.
Demonstrates a willingness to face challenges head-on, even if they are frustrating.
Encourages the group to assign tasks based on initiative, promoting teamwork.
Instructs Sha'ek on the best method to descend, demonstrating his leadership and tactical acumen.
Showing concern for the party's safety and cautioning against unnecessary risks.
Providing support and encouragement to Pipira as she contemplates her next move.
Showed adaptability and willingness to follow a creative plan.
Expressing reluctance to use his abilities, possibly due to a personal or moral choice.
Focuses on repairing the ship and not moving forward too quickly.
Proposes a rotation schedule for the watch duty, suggesting it be done every four hours.
Expresses concern about potential double spies among the group.
Mentions Perlux, possibly indicating a connection or relationship.
Furnax is questioning the use of creativity in gameplay, suggesting a more rules-based approach.
Asserts his role as the 'bad cop'.
Furnax reveals that 'Fuckelbergin' is the first book he ever created, suggesting his origin as a creative individual.
Tries to negotiate a more favorable position with Pipira Shimmerlock.
Implies a willingness to manipulate situations for personal gain.
Furnax reassures the group about his watch duty, showing confidence despite the group's doubts.
Expresses concern about the appearance of a fellow wizard, hinting at racial or cultural sensitivities.
Attempts to help a new person by offering to teach them something.
Discusses the possibility of trading skills and knowledge with others.
Discusses the possibility of trading skills and knowledge, indicating a willingness to share resources.
Expresses a willingness to share knowledge and resources, hinting at a collaborative mindset.
Acknowledging the limitations of cross-learning due to his own specialization and limited resources.
Questions the conventional system, suggesting a more flexible approach.
Shows a practical and resourceful side, addressing the issue of supplies on the ship.
Manages to take over a task and ensure the group's progress.
Advises Pipira to consider their choices carefully and acknowledges her intelligence.
Provides reassurance and acknowledges Pipira's intelligence.
Expresses willingness to visit Pipira's home despite the possibility of dealing with her cats.
He is skeptical of the others' loyalty and mission integrity.
He is asserting his own commitment to the mission.
Reflects on the potential for betrayal within their party, demonstrating caution and vigilance.
Questions about the Four Horsemen and their nature reflect Furnax's curiosity and investigative drive.
Acknowledges the party's ability to see into the future, showing respect.
Acknowledges the knowledge of cults from his school background.
Mentions the lack of significant cult activities in Atlas.
Acknowledges the limited information about cult activities in Atlas.
Acknowledging Sha'ek's actions and encouraging further investigation.
Expresses satisfaction with a magical item he created for Marja.
Furnax seems hesitant about the Krimwaal book and corrects himself after initial confusion.
Furnax shows a level of respect and trust in the group's decision-making process, even when expressing initial hesitation.
Attempts to maintain focus and provides a demonstration of abilities.
Participates in the decision-making process for assigning watch duties.
Acknowledges a need for caution and knowledge about the environment.
Shares their meta-knowledge and how it influences decision-making in the game.
Provides valuable tactical insight and challenges the feasibility of Sha'ek's plan.
Showed adaptability and resourcefulness in combat, using a stinger attack.
Confirmed the construct's nature and its completion through the use of stone.
Shows interest in Sha'ek's weapon history, potentially hinting at a deeper relationship or rivalry.
Decides to remain hidden despite potential damage from casting a spell.
Discusses the limitations and uses of his abilities, showing strategic thinking.
Expressed willingness to help his allies by casting spells and taking the front.
Demonstrates tactical acumen and foresight in predicting attacks
Shows flexibility and adaptability in a complex combat situation.
Questions the reliability of his own abilities, showing self-reflection.
Shows adaptability by using the Chaotic Shuffle effectively in combat.
Acknowledged the power of Pipira's move, suggesting a sense of awe or jealousy.
Discusses the importance of the bag of distraction and its mechanics with the group.
Demonstrates flexibility and resourcefulness by using the bag of distraction despite limitations.
Demonstrates a quick and impulsive decision-making process under pressure.
Acknowledges the group's knowledge and his need to adapt.
Shows a sense of relief and gratitude for the opportunity to roll again.
Questions the practicality of Shield usage in combat.
Expresses difficulty with managing in-game mechanics and spell effects.
Admits to having fun with the blur effect despite its difficulty.
Expresses feeling high and blessed, showing emotional instability.
Refuses to be influenced by others, asserting his own actions despite potential consequences.
Acknowledged the presence of a creature and suggested actions within its territory.
Doubted his own abilities to communicate effectively with the group from a distance.
Demonstrates adaptability by using different tactics in combat.
Recognizes the unexpected outcome of the battle and its implications.
Shows concern for his allies and the situation at hand.
Explains the ongoing situation with hangsels and wyverns.
Explains the necessity of multiple trips and tasks to achieve their goals.
Explains the limitations and structure of the lower deck.
Furnax is demonstrating caution and a methodical approach to the situation, ensuring safety before making decisions.
Acknowledging his inexperience with a task.
Furnax is considering creative but risky solutions to the situation.
Asks about the ability to use a spell again, indicating a reliance on magical abilities.
Acknowledges the state of a photo, likely indicating personal significance and potential trauma.
Acknowledges a mistake in killing Aletta, showing remorse.
Acknowledges the use of violence and its consequences.
Reflects on past actions and their impact, indicating personal growth.
Shares knowledge and experiences with the group, showing mentorship or leadership.
Discusses the dangers of the forest and the presence of dangerous animals.
Mentions the presence of various animals and the need to control their population.
Furnax is expressing a desire to help and support his teammates, indicating loyalty and care.
Expresses a willingness to potentially kill for the campaign.
Considers alternative actions if no other springers are present, showing strategic thinking.
Contemplates rolling for medicine next time to avoid similar situations.
Furnax shows a strategic and tactical approach, suggesting he is planning ahead.
Furnax is showing signs of a complex emotional state, vacillating between different decisions.
Furnax is considering the mechanics and implications of a warcheck, showing strategic thinking.
Furnax is demonstrating a strategic approach to problem-solving, considering creative solutions.
Expresses concern for Pipira's comfort and safety.
Reacts to a misunderstanding about Pipira's stance and role in a mission.
Acknowledges the need to improve his intimidation tactics and considers role-playing more effectively.
Expresses concern about alcoholism and plans to manage it.
Decides on a character specialization from multiple options, showing decision-making skills and commitment.
Shows confusion and adaptability to sudden changes in the situation.
Acknowledges the chaos and unexpected outcomes of the situation, showing adaptability.
Reflecting on the team's dynamic and their role in it.
Refuses to engage with the group, possibly indicating a shift in their relationship or a strategic retreat
Demonstrating clear and strategic thinking during combat planning.
Shows a pragmatic and decisive approach to handling the situation on the boat.
Mentions the difficulty of dealing with the situation alone, highlighting his isolation.
Shows a sense of isolation and the need for others, indicating his personality change.
Discusses potential future actions and the group's current state, hinting at a shift towards piracy.
Expresses concern about the group's losses and acknowledges that there were no fatalities.
Acknowledges the group's current state and suggests they continue their journey with fewer members.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je ziet zo'n pakkie wens en jij zegt, ah, kijk die oude tand.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax makes an amusing observation about perceiving a bear costume as a teenager in a bear suit during the dice rolling session.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dus, alles is er weer op de gaten. / Maar dat gaat eigenlijk dus... / Dat zal dus wat komen... / Ik ben een kat. / Je bent geen kat. / Jij had dus eigenlijk om acht uur nou de wacht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax questions why he is acting like a cat towards someone else and mentions his duty to take watch at eight o'clock.

memorable_quotes.quote: Terwijl ze heel kalm overkomt, blijft niet veel haast aan de hand te zijn, ik word je wel ontploffed als je maar geluid te krijgen is.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax warns a potential threat with a sarcastic and threatening tone, highlighting his protectiveness.

memorable_quotes.quote: en niet dezelfde beweging, zie je toch... soms een beetje al niet ontsnappend bewegen, maar wel van dat ze ongemakkelijk zijn. Weet je, als ze een beetje heel foutjes ziet.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is examining a restrained creature to ensure its well-being.

memorable_quotes.quote: Wat zeg je? Natuurlijk. Als je niet oppast, dan gooi ik je dadelijk dit water in je gezicht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax warns another character about the consequences of not paying attention during an intimidation attempt.

memorable_quotes.quote: Wat een simpele perception.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax expresses satisfaction with a straightforward Perception check.

memorable_quotes.quote: Kut!
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax directly states his dissatisfaction about having to pay for the service, indicating a conflict within the party.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Ik ben best wel zo slim.
Als je op een boot staat en je begint met vliegen.
Die boot gaat een stuk sneller.
Nee, dat had ik niet gedacht.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax boasts about his intelligence and flying abilities, showing his confidence in himself.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dat was poepcorn. Poepcorn in de onderbroek.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax tries to lighten the mood by making a crude joke, but it backfires and draws attention to itself.

memorable_quotes.quote: Er is geen inhoudelijke informatie. Er wordt ook niet over geschreven wie ze zoekt. Of dergelijke. Het is heel standaard van.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax questions whether the diary contains any substantive information, hinting that the content may be misleading or dangerous.

memorable_quotes.quote: Maar als pip, en twintig.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax agrees with Pipira's point, adding a playful element to the discussion.

memorable_quotes.quote: als er een net 20 was geweest had hij waarschijnlijk in 1 keer door het midden
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax mentioned that if he had rolled a 20, the attack would have been fatal.

memorable_quotes.quote: Omdat ik dan al weet welke monsters ik ook wil gebruiken
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains why they are prepared with specific monsters in mind, showing foresight.

memorable_quotes.quote: The bag of distraction appears as a finely crafted satchel Made of dark leather Covered in arcane symbols of mischief and trickery And small mechanical toys that whirl with their own magical essence.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax gives a detailed description of the bag of distraction, highlighting its magical and mechanical features.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je hebt een spel? / Ja. / Wat je hebt gemerkt, is deze heeft geen zwak of sterk in. / In deze lijkt het wel neutraal.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is explaining that the entity they are facing does not have a clear strength or weakness, leading to a discussion about their game choice.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dan gaan we. / Dan haal ik die even weg en dan wil ik Witchbolt casten.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is emphasizing the importance of casting Witchbolt despite the current situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Explains the consequences of missing a concentration save, emphasizing the importance of staying focused.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that missing a concentration save results in losing one's blurriness effect, stressing the critical nature of maintaining focus during combat.

memorable_quotes.quote: Explains the nature of concentration saves and their impact on spell effects.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that missing a concentration save results in losing one's blurriness effect, emphasizing the importance of maintaining focus during combat.

memorable_quotes.quote: Je zou er nog nog eens daaronder. Maar dan zou je wel een rol moeten doen. Want dat is ook een behoorlijke val.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains the potential dangers and precautions needed when jumping from a hole in the zeppelin's structure.

memorable_quotes.quote: Hallo kapitein. A la posta. Onze verstekeling. Nu gevangenen.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax leads the team into knocking on the captain’s door, showing their readiness to proceed with their mission.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik zou dorst. Precies, maar leek heilig water, weet je dat. Je komt je kamertje uit, daar bij die gezamenlijke ruimte, zie daar een klerk. Eigenlijk net zo'n water heilig aan het maken.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is instructed to drink holy water, but has an inexplicable urge to do so regardless of the circumstances.

memorable_quotes.quote: But dan is het Fuckelbergin.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax humorously references 'Fuckelbergin' as an alternative to 'Huckleberry Finn'.

memorable_quotes.quote: En de fly. Want die zijn op een schip gewoon heel erg handig.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is recommending which of several magical abilities Pipira can choose from.

memorable_quotes.quote: Hahaha. Dat was poepcorn. Jawel, ik wil met die short of luck... hahaha.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax and others are discussing something that has led to corn in someone's underpants, creating a humorous situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik heb een keer een one shot gespeeld, Anne. En ik zat in een party, Anne. Waarvan één van de leden zijn missie was... Om te saboteren. Om ons te saboteren. De missie was, één van onze andere partyleden die moest je assassinen.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax shares a past experience with the group where they were betrayed by one of their own, leading to a momentary setback.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ja, chaos is gewoon een echte oeroude entiteit, ja, wat slecht is, laten we het gewoon eenvoudig houden. Dat laatste gedeelte met de houwbringers, dat is nog niet helemaal bevestigd, maar daar komt het wel op neer vanuit oude verhalen.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax discusses chaos theory and the houwbringers in relation to Gaia's recent events.

memorable_quotes.quote: Fem in dit geval, is niet alleen per se honger, het gaat van, we hebben eten nodig, maar ook honger na 1 nacht. Honger... Refereeput 1 Honger na sterke horen. Dat is elke soort honger die je je kan voorstellen.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax elaborates on the famin, explaining it goes beyond just hunger and includes a heightened sense of need.

memorable_quotes.quote: States that they are aware of the cults due to their school background.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax clarifies that his knowledge of cults comes from academic study rather than general public awareness, highlighting the specialized nature of this information.

memorable_quotes.quote: De nikkerpartie is starten en iedereen naakt.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is making light of the situation by joking about the alarms being related to porn.

memorable_quotes.quote: Uit zijn favoriete lijst.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is inquiring about the source of the alarm, adding to the confusion.

memorable_quotes.quote: 'Een lucky kan ik op attack roepsen, ja.' '22 raakt wel.'
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax used a special attack to land a successful blow on the enemy, showcasing his tactical prowess.

memorable_quotes.quote: en je hebt nu gemiddeld damage per ronde
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax was discussing the average damage his character could deal.

memorable_quotes.quote: ik heb een helemaal standaard item hoor
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax mentioned having a standard, unremarkable item.

memorable_quotes.quote: Wat had ik toen gezegd voor een wapen?
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax asks what weapon Sha'ek had before, showing his interest in understanding the character's background.

memorable_quotes.quote:
Ik kies dan voor de damage.
[02:21:57] SPEAKER_02: Fire damage.
Op 10?
Ja.
Dat is 12 fire damage.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax decides on a fire-based attack, showing his combat readiness and willingness to engage in battle.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dit is de Bight. Uhm, 17. Volgens mij haalt dat niet.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax describes the incoming attack and its outcome.

memorable_quotes.quote: Eet zichzelf!
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax makes a humorous and unexpected statement, adding to the atmosphere.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik gok het erop of die mij wel of niet hit.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax decides to cast a cone spell with uncertain results, showing willingness to take risks.

memorable_quotes.quote: 'Mijn Chaotic Shuffle. Naar die motherfuckers.'
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax describes his Chaotic Shuffle item and how it deals damage in combat.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik vind dit zo leuk bedacht! Ik zal hem wel even in charge hebben. En dan kan ik nog als een bonus action nog een keer in die zak grabbelen.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax expresses excitement about using the bag of distraction for a bonus action to retrieve an item.

memorable_quotes.quote: Het is een cast at will. Het is een counteract. Eén is weg. Twee... Hij is incapacitated.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that using an item will result in disadvantage on their next attack roll before the end of the next turn.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dat hoeft niet. Ja, fuck jou.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is arguing about the movement rules during a tactical discussion, showing impatience and frustration.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik kan alleen nog maar met electric shit iets doen. Lightning Tucson.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax reveals his inability to perform non-electric magic and references a game he might have chosen differently.

memorable_quotes.quote: Witchbolt? Witchbolt?
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax repeatedly asks about and confirms the Witchbolt spell, showing excitement or uncertainty.

memorable_quotes.quote: 'Dat heeft helemaal geen zin.' and 'Zo werkt het.'
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax expresses frustration with the shield's effectiveness.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik vind het altijd moeilijk als wizard om die spelletjes erbij af te schepen. Wat heb ik nou allemaal gedraaid?
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax discusses his struggles with managing spell effects and the importance of being consistent.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dat is eigenlijk wel een goeie. Dus daar hou ik ook even van.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax discusses the unfolding situation and its consequences.

memorable_quotes.quote: Daarop gehakt worden, want ze zijn zelf ook dus... Hoelang dat zo goed blijft gaan.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains that hangsels are being ground down by wyverns, who themselves are also struggling.

memorable_quotes.quote: We hebben geen zin meer.
memorable_quotes.context: The party expresses their desire to stop, and Furnax talks about the pigs in the area.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ze ziet er eigenlijk al meteen bloedig uit.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax mentions that the pigs have been shot and are in the freezer.

memorable_quotes.quote: Die hebben zo'n lijf hè. Gewoon die in het doorsneden gewoon.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax describes the large animals they hunt, focusing on their small legs in contrast to their massive bodies.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dat zijn echt kanonnen van beesten.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax describes in detail how the hunted animals are disproportionate, emphasizing their size compared to their legs.

memorable_quotes.quote: Als je jezelf zo vasthoudt. En als je weer in de relics mag, zeg. Weet je wel, een vreemdstuken maken. Het was eerst een 5. Maar dat is nu een 16. Met mijn laatste lucky.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax reflected on his last successful attack, attributing it to luck.

memorable_quotes.quote: min max max max
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is discussing the utility of his Misty Step ability in terms of optimal character build.

memorable_quotes.quote: Maar de rando's... Nee, die moeten blijven leven. Maar de campagne-character... Die schieten we kapot.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax expresses a harsh view on who lives and dies in the campaign, showing his callous nature.

memorable_quotes.quote: Maar er was niemand gestorven.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax reassures the group that no one died on their ship, highlighting a crucial moment in the campaign.

memorable_quotes.quote: Pas op voor 3 weken en dan is het een zondag.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax hints at a future event happening on a Sunday in three weeks, possibly related to the magical chaos.

memorable_quotes.quote: I can still leave her warcheck behind there,
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is considering leaving a trace of Furnix's warcheck while escaping from Pipira Shimmerlock.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ik heb een kruid in haar verschoten. Dat zou ik benieuwen. Ik ben dus wel op haar in aan het praten in de tussentijd, gewoon een beetje, zeg maar... Wat zeg je? Je mag het roleplayen, je mag ook even zo wat je zelf helemaal vindt.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax proposes a trade or offer as an incentive for Pipira's involvement, showing his attempt to engage her more actively in the mission.

memorable_quotes.quote: Als je die heet, is het hier een blaffe.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax uses the term 'blaffe' to express excitement or agreement, indicating his use of colloquial language in social interactions.

memorable_quotes.quote: I'm on the dek, on the dek!
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax reacts to an alarm, expressing surprise at being on the deck during an alert.

memorable_quotes.quote: Fucking glass cannon over here.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax was described by another player as a 'glass cannon', emphasizing the character's combat style.

memorable_quotes.quote: En twee, hoe zal ik het zeggen, van die white ones duiken er achteraan. En dan ziet ze van... Ze zit daar in de ketting vast.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax explains the chaotic scene with falling letters and characters in a free fall scenario.

memorable_quotes.quote: Ja, jij ziet het heel goed hier. Maar jij ook wel. Je ziet wel dat ze spreekt.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax vividly describes how a character is hanging by their neck, adding to the tension of the scene.

memorable_quotes.quote: Daar zit niet ook zo'n ding in. Dus ik liet mezelf eigenlijk naar beneden. Volgens mij zit daaronder een zeil.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax expresses concern about what lies beneath a dangerous layer, highlighting the uncertainty of their situation.

memorable_quotes.quote: Dus vijftien feet, zeg maar. En ze moeten een Wisdom save rollen van vijftien.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax is detailing how Wyverns will behave in combat, emphasizing their incapacitation and eventual fall due to the environment.

memorable_quotes.quote: Er was een ding in de boot om rood te worden.
memorable_quotes.context: Furnax mentions an object on the boat that turns red, likely a reference to his ability to heat materials.

current_goals: Mentions the recent acquisition of spells related to a flying vessel, hinting at progress in his quest.
Discusses the potential survival situation on the ship and suggests setting up a patrol schedule.
Mentions the search for people connected to death and other harbingers.
Describes the use of a mechanical item from the bag of distraction.
Decides to cast Witchbolt after gathering information.
Furnax discusses the group's plan to deal with a demented enemy.
Planning the next steps in their mission.
